resources.string:
Click the Start button to play speech-to-text with Next-gen Kaldi. 
 


 The source code and pre-trained models are publicly available. Please see https://github.com/k2-fsa/sherpa-ncnn for details. 


 Note: This is an early demo using a transducer-based model with about 18.6 million parameters. The model is trained using Wenetspeech and therefore it supports only Chinese.



 We use https://github.com/tencent/ncnn for neural network computation.
